document_data.name: Jurck
document_data.mainbody: '''Jurck''' was a lieutenant of the [[Cult of the Dragon]] ''circa'' [[1369 DR]] during the occupation of the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]], stationed in the [[Elven Catacombs]] underneath [[Castle Cormanthor]].
document_data.History: In 1369 DR, a fellow commander of the Cult, [[Galibel]] communicated with Lieutenant Jurck via messenger-carried letters. In one such communication Galibel expressed concerns over something or someone big tearing through previous night's patrol of soulless [[drow]] slaves and taking off with the Cult's [[wizard]]'s body. Galibel requested to switch duties with Jurck's team in the Elven Catacombs in an attempt to catch the mysterious perpetrator.
